REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Restricts the disclosure of personal information by businesses
Summary: Restricts the disclosure of personal information by businesses.
LawCode: Amd Art 39-F Art Head, add ยง899-cc, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to restricting the disclosure of personal information by businesses
